errorMessage.noFileSelected: No file selected. Choose a file to upload.
errorMessage.fileNotTxt: Invalid file format. Select one fomatted as TXT file.
errorMessage.invalidFormat: Incorrect File Format. Select a VAT Invoice file with the correct format.
errorMessage.internalIdCannotFound: There are no transactions found for the VAT Invoices {Internal ID}.
errorMessage.sameVatInfo: The VAT Invoice {Internal ID} that you are attempting to import already exists in the system.
errorMessage.noAppliedVAT: Invalid Format. Please apply the Credit Memo or Cash Refund to the VAT Invoice first.
errorMessage.moreThanOneAppliedVAT: This Credit Memo can only be applied to one VAT Invoice.
errorMessage.noVATInfo: The invoice selected does not have VAT Information or has remarks that are in incorrect format.
errorMessage.noChinaSubsidiary: You have no subsidiaries in China. Go to Setup > Company > Subsidiaries to create one.
errorMessage.noChinaSubsidiarySI: Your current company is not located in China.
errorMessage.invalidDate: Select a start date that is earlier than the end date.
errorMessage.invalidCashSale: Cash Sale Number is either incorrect or does not exist.
errorMessage.invalidCashRefund: Cash Sale Number has already been refunded.
errorMessage.noDataExport: No Search Results Match Your Criteria.
errorMessage.invalidSheetNo: The information sheet number should be 16 digits.
errorMessage.exsitedSheetNo: The information sheet number entered already exists.
errorMessage.invalidInvoiceType: Small-Scale Taxpayers cannot issue special VAT Invoices.
errorMessage.invalidQuantity: The quantity or amount does not match the selected VAT invoice.
errorMessage.invalidAmount: Discount should not exceed tax exclusive amount.
errorMessage.impExceedGovernance: The VAT invoices exceed the governance, please reimport the file from VAT Invoice {Internal ID}.
errorMessage.vatNumberExceed: The number of VAT Invoices have exceeded the limit. Please import fifty (50) invoices per file.

warningMessage.invoiceEditWarning: The transaction has already been exported for VAT invoicing.
warningMessage.lengthExceed: The value for {fieldname} has exceeded the {length} limit.
warningMessage.okOrCancel: Click Cancel to stop exporting or click OK to proceed.
